title: MediPredictor AI
description: This is a project to help users predict the likelihood of developing diabetes or heart disease.

title: NEUDorms
description: This is a project made to service the 15000+ NEU students in their on-campus housing search through a reddit like forum page for accurate reviews and centralized info.

title: Reversi
description: Implementation of Othello Reversi game made to showcase Object Oriented Programming, Test Driven Development, various design paradigms, and good coding practices.
